synopsis.text: Anniversary Special, U.C. 0079: Amidst the peaceful tranquility of a neutral space colony, chaos erupts as a formidable squadron of Zakus from the Principality of Zeon launch an unexpected invasion. Stepping up to the challenge, Amuro Ray, an unlikely hero, takes the helm of the cutting-edge Gundam G40 prototype mobile suit, engaging in a high-stakes battle against the enemy forces, including the legendary Zeon ace pilot, Char Aznable, commanding his distinctive red Zaku II. This thrilling short anime not only marks the 40th anniversary of the iconic Gundam franchise but also promotes the High Grade 1/144 scale Gundam G40 model kit, a collaborative effort between Gundam, Ken Okuyama Design, and LDH Japan. Witness a fresh take on some of the most memorable scenes from the original Gundam television anime in this commemorative special.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
